message.content:
cs.CV, cs.IR, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI. 

The paper deals with a computer vision problem of text detection and recognition, which is a common topic in the computer vision community. Therefore, cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition) is the most likely sub-category. The paper also involves deep learning techniques and neural networks, which are relevant to cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.LG (Machine Learning). The paper also discusses the use of convolutional features and joint training, which are relevant to cs.CL (Computation and Language) and cs.IR (Information Retrieval).
